title: Shovel Knight (GOG) (Latest With 1.0E Patch)
description:
Hey guys, gog just released a new installer for "Shovel Knights". This new installer contains the latest patch which is 1.0e. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


------------------


Changes for 1.0E: 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢NEW: Controller option allows disabling all controller use in game. 
Intended for players who might prefer to use external gamepad mapping 
tools -- weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll continue to support as many input devices as we possibly can! 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢NEW: Feat progress is immediately saved upon unlocking. Previously, 
Feats could be unlocked but lost by the regular saving mechanisms if a 
game exited or turned off before reaching an autosave point. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢NEW:Direction inputs can be bound to multiple buttons--just press more 
than one input at once. Intended for players who wanted to map Shovel 
Drop to its own button. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Removed an Ã¢â‚¬Å“emptyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Song Scroll from Clockwork Tower which could 
never be collected or turned in. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Ã¢â‚¬Å“Reflect Lord FeatÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ only incrementing enemies hit count if it the 
reflected attack was non-fatal. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: DualShock button prompts not auto-detecting. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Treasure Knight getting caught on walls during vertical downward 
anchor shots. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Player could retreat to the previous screen during Specter 
KnightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s battle. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: (Alchemy Lab) Sound would loop forever if the Potion Master mid 
boss was defeated at a certain frame 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: (Tower: ????) Soft lock fix involving NPC AI. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Double KO end to a boss battles disabled access to pause and relic 
menus. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Potential Fix: LogitechWingmanRumblepad controller bindings. Please let 
us know if you are still experiencing issues with any device! 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Additional controller support. Thank You to everyone who submitted 
their devices! 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Ã¢â‚¬Å“HalfwayÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Feat unlocking when re-clearing a stage. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Black Knight ignores damage during Plains intro. For some players, 
there was a small window of opportunity to Ground Spark which could 
cause Black Knight to go off script. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Sparker Feat not unlocking when defeating Black Knight. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Player and Encounter Map movement halting the game under certain 
vsync/video settings. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fix: Monitors running higher than 60hz running at double speed or faster
